text: @NYGovCuomo Don't use a crisis for your b.s. charter agenda, Andrew & @BillGates. Turning public schools into online privately-run charters is WRONG. Stop this & start requiring the wealthy & corporations to pay taxes to support real public schools. #Vote #PublicEd https://t.co/P63f6FWjMv
